QuestData.Title: Battle Spear of the Thunder King
QuestData.Description: I have received some troubling news, $n.$B$BThe mogu are plotting to steal three artifacts of power from the Vale.$B$BWe must retrieve the artifacts immediately and hide them for safekeeping.$B$BThe first artifact is the Battle Spear of the Thunder King.$B$BUpon emperor Lei Shen's death, the spear was placed in an ancient shrine to the northwest.$B$BBring the spear back to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve the Battle Spear of the Thunder King.
